name: CHESS ADVENTURE
description:
A 5-level point-and-click puzzle game where you play as a queen.

Navigate through the levels and avoid the obstacles while collecting keys to unlock the door at the end. If you make contact with the spikes or rooks you'll take damage and if all your health is depleted,  you'll lose a life and be sent back to the beginning of the level. Pass through all the levels to win.
